page.title: 13Some Old Buildings.
page.content: { {THE TOLLGATE HOUSE}- It is opposite our School and it is now a home. There were only four rooms - sitting room, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. You can see all that is going on because the windows are on a different wall and there are 8 walls. The roof is pointed. We went into the garden and saw a duck.{PENSCOT FARMHOUSE {HOTEL}- In the 15th Century the nearby MANOR was built, with 3 cottages for the workers at the{MANOR}- shepherd, game keeper and steward. These 3 cottages today have become {PENSCOT {FARMHOUSE HOTEL. }We saw the Dining room,the bar, the kitchens, many bedrooms and the gardens. There was a sunken rose garden which looked very beautiful. We asked lots of questions.Many people work here.
